introduction: I am a great fan of the original Hababam Sinifi series and i thought the 2004version was a nice comeback with traditional themes and comedy. The 2005 releasewas testing its limits with a new setting in the army and had a ridiculousending in my opinion but i thought it was still traditional. However thisrelease was a total disappointment for me. It had the comedy and the lovablecharacters but the storyline was extremely poor and out of portion. It seemedthe filmmakers were using ideas from various foreign films which lost theaudience. The audience is not stupid they know what is from what and when theplot does not link up. This movie lost the whole theme of the chaotic classwhich gave their teachers hell but managed to win their hearts in the end. Ilaughed a lot but i left the cinema feeling extremely annoyed. If they makeanother release i hope they devote more time into the storyline and the valuesof the concept. 5/10 for the comedy and characters like Bebe Ruhi and Psiko.
